game.name: Cozy Sketcher - AI Drawing Game
game.shortDescription: Cozy Sketcher is a relaxing single-player drawing game with AI feedback. Gain detailed insights about your drawing from AI and get personalized rewards. Take on creative challenges, earn gems, and unlock new drawing tools.
